title: Love Me Like You Do/ Sugar/ See You Again (Mash Up)
lyrics: Love me like you do, love me like you do Love me like you do, love me like you do oh… Touch me like you do, touch me like you do Love me like you do, love me like you do. You’re the light, you’re the night You’re the cure, you’re the pain You’re the only thing I wanna touch Never knew that it could mean so much You’re the color of my blood ‘Cause I’ve never been so high Let me take you past our satellites You can see the world you brought to life You’re the fear, I don’t care Follow me through the dark I’m hurting, baby, I’m broken down I need your loving, loving BG: oh When I’m without you <> I’m something weak You got me begging, begging I’m on my knees.
